column4: So, I need some help here. I have an ntfs partition, It is on block device /dev/hda1. It needs to mount automatically when the computer starts. I need Read/Write access from a user account (alex). I can edit the fstab with no problems, but when it mounts it says I do not have permission to access it.
only read support is available in ubuntu, unless you go for captive drivers, which aren't that reliable.
uid=youruserid -- that should give you read access.
